lines.text: I don't mean to pry or nothing, but it's just... I wonder how a man gets such bad enemies.
I never had any good ones.
I reckon we ought to bury him.
You find the head and I'll bury the rest of him.
I guess the buzzards got to eat too. Old Colby, he was once a friend.
And once he wasn't.
I can't say he looks any worse for being dead.
They're on a downhill roll to hell!
They were here.
The place they've just left is about as close as we seem to get.
Redlegs and regulators... the only thing that came out of the war was new names for killers.
You don't talk much, do you?
Nope.
Is it me?
It might get to be.
And when you're alone, do you talk to yourself?
Yep, and I have the good sense to know when to shut up.
Well, what do you talk about?
No one else finds me this facinating. Why you?
Well, it ain't because you're so facinating. It's just that you're the only one here.
You overestimate me, Padre
Oh no, you underestimate yourself.
There's always someone faster.
He's the one.
What one?
The one who's always faster.
You're a hell of a shot, Cowboy. But in the human being department, you barely meet basic requirements.
Patience isn't exactly his strong suit.
What is?
Shooting people who make me impatient.
What's the gun for?
It helps cut out the small talk.
You're pretty gun at killing.
It's not a talent I wished for.
Why are them regulators trying to kill ya.
Religious differences.
Well, dead is dead.
I don't want him dead - I want to kill him!
Where are you from?
No place in particular?
Where are you headed?
Same place.
What the hell would you know about a future?
Nothing, but I know enough about not having one.
I know that after all we've been through it's gonna seem kind of dumb to you, but I think I'm gonna stay here.
The longer I live, the more I have to reconsider what I think is dumb.
